amendment.description: An amendment numbered 10 printed in Part B of House Report 116-154 to require the Director of National Intelligence to submit an intelligence assessment on the relationship between women and violent extremism and terrorism.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Frankel amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Frankel amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A010) offered by Ms. Frankel.
